DataSource - Interface in de.ovgu.softwareprojekt
Interface for sensor data sources
de.ovgu.softwareprojekt - package de.ovgu.softwareprojekt
This package contains all common classes, that is classes used in both the server and the app.
de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.control - package de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.control
This package contains classes pertaining the control flow used in both the server and the app.
de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.control.commands - package de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.control.commands
This package contains all command types, subclasses of AbstractCommand like SetSensorCommand.
de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.discovery - package de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.discovery
This package contains classes pertaining the discovery system in both server and app.
de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.misc - package de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.misc
This package contains miscellaneous classes.
de.ovgu.softwareprojektapp - package de.ovgu.softwareprojektapp
This package contains all classes used for the app except the ones in the common part.
de.ovgu.softwareprojektapp.activities - package de.ovgu.softwareprojektapp.activities
All activity code
de.ovgu.softwareprojektapp.activities.send - package de.ovgu.softwareprojektapp.activities.send
Code for the SendActivity.
de.ovgu.softwareprojektapp.networking - package de.ovgu.softwareprojektapp.networking
Contains all networking classes required by the app: Discovery system: DiscoveryClient Data pipeline start: UdpConnection Data- and command connection manager: NetworkClient The CommandConnection is in the common package
de.ovgu.softwareprojektapp.sensors - package de.ovgu.softwareprojektapp.sensors
Contains all classes needed to handle the sensor communication and activation state.
de.ovgu.softwareprojektapp.sensors.implementations - package de.ovgu.softwareprojektapp.sensors.implementations
Contains all AbstractSensor implementations, and thus all sensor classes known to the framework

DiscoveryClient - Class in de.ovgu.softwareprojektapp.networking
This thread manages sending discovery request packages and receiving answers from servers.

DiscoveryClient.ServerList - Class in de.ovgu.softwareprojektapp.networking
A TimerTask extension that removes old servers
discoveryPort - Variable in class de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.discovery.NetworkDevice
discoveryPort the device is listening on this port for server discovery purposes
DiscoveryThread - Class in de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.discovery
This abstract class serves as a skeleton for implementing both the discovery server implementation as well as the discovery client implementation.
DiscoveryThread(String, int, int) - Constructor for class de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.discovery.DiscoveryThread
Create a new DiscoveryThread when you already know your command- and data port, for example for use in a server announcing where to connect.
DiscoveryThread(String) - Constructor for class de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.discovery.DiscoveryThread
Create a new DiscoveryThread.
DisplayNotification - Class in de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.control.commands
This command may be used by the server to request the display of a notification.
